item.description:
The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section is hosting a Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Black Bear in New Haven on Thursday, November 6, 2008. The event is from 5:30 â€“ 9:00. Black Bear will be providing drink specials and free appetizers. This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Drink Specials and Free Food: Black Bear will be providing select free drinks for the 1st hour and at 7:00 PM a $10 bracelet can be purchased for two hours of open bar. Additionally, drink specials will be provided for the rest of the evening. Black Bear will also be providing a free buffet to all attendees.

Your contact is NHC'er Josh, who can be reached at 203-772-0070 if you have any questions.
item.name: Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Black Bear Saloon
